6KW Truma Combi Diesel RV Parking Heater

Introducing the 6kW Truma Combi Diesel Heater, your ultimate solution for cozy comfort in your RV, no matter the weather.

This powerful heater boasts a robust 6kW output, effectively warming even spacious living areas. Enjoy a warm and inviting atmosphere as you relax after a long day on the road. The Truma Combi utilizes efficient diesel combustion, ensuring reliable heat generation with minimal fuel consumption.

  • Powerful 6kW Output: Perfect for heating large RVs and keeping your space toasty warm.
  • Diesel Fuel Efficiency: Maximize your fuel efficiency while staying comfortably warm on chilly nights.
  • Reliable Performance: Built with Truma's renowned quality, you can trust this heater to deliver consistent heat output.

The Truma Combi Diesel Heater is designed for effortless operation and safe use. Its compact size makes it ideal for installation in various RV models. Experience the ultimate comfort and warmth in your mobile home with the 6kW Truma Combi Diesel Heater.

Keep warm and cozy on chilly nights with this powerful 6kW Truma Combi Diesel Heater. Designed specifically for RVs, this reliable and efficient heater provides comfortable warmth even in the coldest temperatures.

  • Powerful 6kW Heating Output: Provides ample heat to comfortably warm your RV space.
  • Diesel Fuel Efficiency: Operates on diesel fuel for long-lasting performance and economical heating.
  • Compact Design: Built with a compact footprint to fit seamlessly into your RV's setup.
  • Automatic Ignition System: Starts easily and reliably with an automatic ignition system.
  • Thermostat Control: Maintain your desired temperature with precise thermostat control.

This heater is designed for efficient operation and reliable performance. It features a powerful diesel burner to generate heat, along with a user-friendly interface for adjusting settings.

Enjoy the following benefits when using this Truma Combi Diesel Heater:

  • Ultimate Comfort: Stay warm and comfortable even in freezing temperatures while parked at your favorite campsite.
  • Energy Efficiency: Save money on heating costs with the efficient diesel fuel system.
  • Ease of Use: The simple controls allow for effortless operation and temperature adjustment.

This RV parking heater is designed to provide warmth while your RV is parked. It can be connected to your vehicle's diesel fuel tank for a continuous power source. Ensure proper ventilation according to the manufacturer's instructions. Before using, carefully read the user manual to familiarize yourself with all safety features and operating procedures.
